Package com.bteam.common.utils

Class RelationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.bteam.common.utils.RelationUtils
public class RelationUtils extends Object
Class containing helper methods for working with the relationships between classes.

    • vectorArrayToPatternString

      public static String vectorArrayToPatternString(Vector2D[] vectorArray, Vector2D middle)
      Get a string visualization of a vector array representing a pattern.

      The pattern will be displayed around the middle position in all directions, with x marking all vertices from the array and P for the middle. If middle is also part of the array, it'll be marked as + instead of 0. Example: [x: 1, y: 1, x: 1, 0] -> "xx \n 0 \n "

      Parameters:
      vectorArray - The array to represent as a string
      middle - the player position / middle of the pattern
      Returns:
      the string representation
